## Strategy for First Move
When starting a new game, the best approach is to click near the center of the board:
- Center positions are more likely to open up larger safe areas
- Corner/edge positions have fewer adjacent cells, providing less information
- The first click in many Minesweeper implementations is guaranteed to be safe
